tr.td: Character Certificate (from Head of Institution last attended)
Attach three photographs and Domicile Certificate (if any)
Equivalent certificate issued by IBCC in case of O/A levels or qualifications from Foreign Universities/Institutes only

div.span: Note : Before submitting your application, please make sure that above documents have been attached.

strong.b: Person to be informed in case of emergency (Preferably from Lahore)

tr.th: Name of Board i.e(BISE of lahore):

div.span: THAT the particulars filled in the application for admission are true to the best of my knowledge and I shall be responsible for any misstatement therein.
THAT I shall abide by the rules, regulations and conditions of Admission and Post Admission tenure.

Result awaiting applicants; THAT I undertake to submit original/attested copies of my Intermediate/A’ Level results to the Registrar’s Office as soon as the result is declared. If I fail to fulfill the eligibility criteria for admission, Institute has the right to cancel/terminate my admission.
NOTE: The administration reserves the right to make any changes and addition to the program/course regulation and condition governing the conduct of students at any time without notice.
